flawed_nl_solution:
The rancher would have sold his cattle for $204000/340 = $<<204000/340=600.0>>600.0 per head.
He was left with a remainder of 340 - 172 = <<340-172=168>>168 head of cattle.
The lowered price is $600.0 - $150 = $<<600.0-150=450.0>>450.0 per head.
He would make $450.0 x 168 = $<<450.0*168=75600.0>>75600.0 at the lowered price.
He could have made $600.0 x 168 = $<<600.0*168=1008000.0>>1008000.0 at the original price.
He would lose $1008000.0 - $75600.0 = $<<1008000.0-75600.0=932400.0>>932400.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100800.0, not 1008000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
